name: Dynamite Den
description:
You wake up to 3 bombs in your house! You have to find them before its too late. We followed the idea of "Don't panic" by putting the player in a situation where you would panic, so to collect all the bombs in time you have to keep an eye out for them (some are hiding well, some aren't) and not just rush through every mini game. We hope you like it!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Select Object

Right Click - Deselect Object

P - Pause

Esc - Quit
